content: Hi All, please note that http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7au/au-fhir-childhealth/profiles.html is down at this moment. I'll inform when it backs up
Hi all - we are back up with the IG published - some build issues now resolved.
Hi All, please note that http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7au/au-fhir-childhealth/output/index.html is down at this moment. we will inform when it backs up

Hi All, This is to keep you posted that the site is still down. It seems there is a common issue with the Hl7 publication jar which everyone is facing at this moment. I'll keep this group posted once it starts working.

Hi All, this is to keep you posted that the site is up and running with one known issue: the base profile reference to AU profiles are not working (Error: Publishing Content Failed: Unknown Package hl7.fhir.au.base#3.0.1 ).
I had to remove the AU dependency from the build. I'll keep the group posted once I can resolve this issue. However, the group can review the content meanwhile.
Thanks for fixing IG @Shovan Roy
